title: Gyazo

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
When ever I play a match, I end up having to re size the client every time I go in-game. It also changes my FPS lock to 25, and changes my screen mode to windowed. 

Help please!

replies.body:
Hey there,

Sounds to me like your game.cfg (C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config) file might be messed up, try the following.

* Close league of legends.
* Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
* Delete game.cfg
* Restart the client, start a custom game
* Does the issue persist?
I worked! I tried it out in a custom game, it went back to normal. Thank you so much.

Glad your issue is resolved.

See you on the rift,
Seph
